definitions.definition: in low spirits from loss of hope or courage.
examples: disheartened, discouraged, dispirited, downhearted, downcast, crestfallen, down, low, disconsolate, despairing, wretched; Moremelancholy, gloomy, morose, dismal, woebegone, miserable, depressed, dejected, sad; informalblue, down in/at the mouth, down in the dumps "they were tired and despondent"Moremelancholy, gloomy, morose, dismal, woebegone, miserable, depressed, dejected, sad; blue, down in/at the mouth, down in the dumps they were tired and despondent
